General.Name: Sundance Strategies Inc
General.Description: Sundance Strategies, Inc. provides professional services to specialty structured finance groups, bond issuers, and life settlement aggregators. The company offers advisory services relating to bond issuances and life settlement transactions, as well as for the selection of specific portfolios of life insurance policies. Sundance Strategies, Inc. is based in Provo, Utah.
General.Address: 4626 North 300 West, Provo, UT, United States, 84604

1.Name: Mr. Randall F. Pearson
1.Title: Pres, Principal Exec. Officer, Principal Financial Officer & Director
